= kern.syslogd events
:toc: macro
:toclevels: 1
:hardbreaks:
:nofooter:
:icons: font
:linkattrs:
:imagesdir: ./media/

== kern.syslogd.error
*Severity*::
ERROR
*Description*::
This message occurs when an event is generated to log errors from the syslog daemon.
*Corrective Action*::
(None).
*Syslog Message*::
syslog daemon error %s.
*Parameters*::
*ErrMsg* (STRING): Specific error generated by the syslog daemon.
